    • 方法详细资料

      • solve

        FctpSolution solve()
            throws ilog.concert.IloException
        Solve the MasterProblem.
        返回:
        the solution whose "flows" should be set based on the subProblem
        抛出:
        ilog.concert.IloException

      • getNumCores

        int getNumCores()
         throws ilog.concert.IloException
        获取核心数量（用户 BendersCallback 定义线程数）.
        返回:
        the number of logical cores
        抛出:
        ilog.concert.IloException
